resources.string: Ads will be shown during the free trial. If you purchase a license to use the app long-term, the ads will disappear.

Purchasing a license allows you to use Ultimate To-Do List beyond the free trial period. Your license is linked to your Google or Amazon account. It works on all of your Android devices - including smartphones and tablets - and travels with the app automatically as you upgrade or replace devices.

Purchasing a license will also remove all ads from the app.
This will merge the [count] tasks stored on your device with the tasks stored in the online account. Are you sure you want to do this?
